titles.title: A bill to clarify that the revocation of an alien's visa or other documentation is not subject to judicial review.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/31/2011--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to prohibit judicial review of visa or document revocation. (Judicial review is currently permitted in a deportation proceeding if such revocation is the sole ground for deportation.) States that this Act shall: (1) take effect on the date of its enactment; and (2) apply to all visas issued before, on, or after such date.
